short_summary: Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition of services for skylight repairs at the Donnacona Institution. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 21301-249888 with a closing of January 25, 2024 at 2:00 PM.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing this request for proposal – RFP, for the acquisition of services for the skylight repairs at the Donnacona Institution – Correctional service Canada. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 21301-249888 with a closing of January 25, 2024 at 2:00 PM.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Tender Title
Sklity Repair at Donnacona Institution

## Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting sealed proposals from qualified contractors for the skylight repair services at the Donnacona Institution in Quebec.

## Tender Details

* Tender reference number: WS4247008447
* Tender closing date: March 6, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Unspsc code: 72120000 (Non-residential building construction services)
* Procurement category: Construction
* Tender type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Selection criteria: Lowest price

## Contracting Entity Information
* Entity name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information
* Contact name: Veronique Hae Ok Pichette
* Contact role: PWGSC/SPAC
* Contact email: veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents
The tender documents can be accessed through the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18725366?extsite=MTg3MjUzNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that the tender is now closed, and it was previously announced on February 9, 2024. The services are expected to be completed by June 30, 2024.
